item.description:
Let go for breakfast at Sylvan Street Grille


We will be posting this on all 3 of our meetup sites, and we will try to get 1 table but please note you may be sitting w/some people you might not know, come out anyways and make a new friend or two you never know who you are going to meetup with.

Sylvan Street Grille has a great breakfast menu, check out their menu: http://www.sylvanstre...

Breakfast is served between 9:00am and 12:00pm

As usual you are responsible for paying for your order which will include tax and an 18% Gratuity added to parties of 6 of more (which we will have). With a large crowd as we will have please be patient with waiting for our table(s) and be patient w/the wait staff.

As usual we will only wait 15 minutes, if you are running late please find us some where in the restaurant.

Bad weather may cancel this event please make sure you check back for any updates.

Looking forward to seeing you!
Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the waiting area as soon as you step in the 2nd door!
item.name: Let's get together for Breakfast!
